name: Here We Go Again! (jmanholt929, Vinadium, Metater)
name_original: Here We Go Again! (jmanholt929, Vinadium, Metater)
description:
You thought you were safe, didn't you? You did all of your chores hours ago and went to sleep until your mom got home. But jokes on you because your household full of ghosts have made it their mission to ruin your night! Try your hardest to keep the ghost's tampering at bay! 

Controls:

WASD - Movement | E - Interact | Mouse - Complete Tasks
